conclusion: Understand the flow of liquid through the baffles to determine which container (E or F) it will flow into.
Baffles redirect the flow of liquid; color indicates direction after passing through baffles.
Liquid from A, B, C, and D will be redirected by baffles into either container E or F.
Liquid from A is directed by the green baffle to flow into container E.
Liquid from B is directed by the orange baffle to flow into container F.
Liquid from C is directed by the yellow baffle to flow into container F.
Liquid from D is directed by the blue baffle to flow into container E.
Liquid from A and D will flow into container E; liquid from B and C will flow into container F.
Final answer: Container E for liquids from A and D, Container F for liquids from B and C.
